text: Stellar Project is a House/Dance project created by the Italian songwriter and producer Stefano Sorrentino in 2004. The main success is the 2004 dance song Get Up Stand Up featuring Brandi Emma. The song reached #1 of U.S. dance airplay chart in November 20, 2004. In 2011, he released the single Strong featuring Swedish singer Emelie Norenberg. ==References== ==External links== Stefano Sorrentino myspace Category:Italian dance music groups
title: Stellar Project
